sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2023-06-14 22:52:43.680126 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2023-07-13T16:51:23.434616-04:00.

rdgGrp.n: ['<del>a rustic approached armed with a gun and leading a young girl of about twelve years of age when they came near me they turne </del>', 'i', 'was', 'scarcely']
['bone', '', '<del>one the ball had grazed my neck</del>', 'and<del>the', 'an', 'other', 'entered', 'my', 'shoulder.', '</del>']
['', 'the', 'same', 'chapter', 'continued', '', '<del> chap. 9', ' </del>', '', '<del>i now saw </del>', '<del>thus my journey appeared</del>', '<p-end/>', '<p-start/>']

['me.', 'and then i bent over her, and whispered "awake, fairest, thy lover is near—he who would give his life but to obtain one look of affection from thine eyes: my beloved, awake!"<p-end/><p-start/>"the sleeper stirred; a thrill of terror ran through me. should she indeed awake, andsee me, and curse me, and denounce the murderer? thus would she assuredly act, if her darkened eyes opened, and she beheld me. the thought was madness; it stirred the fiend within me—not i, but she shall suffer: the murder i have committed because i am for ever robbed of all that she could give me, she shall atone. the crime had its source in her: be hers the punishment!']
